name: reptilian-cult

scripts.dev: concurrently -n front,back -c green,yellow -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "yarn --prefix ./frontend run dev" "yarn --prefix ./backend run dev"
scripts.lint: yarn --prefix ./frontend run lint && yarn --prefix ./backend run lint
scripts.fix: yarn --prefix ./frontend run fix && yarn --prefix ./backend run fix

author: Wild Code School - Lord Of Pings
